data.title: Weather Application
data.body: This project implimented API calls in order to display changing weather conditon over the text 5 days. Furthermore ive used JQuery to code the Javascript for this project

data.title: IRCClient
data.body: An irc client that works over local host created as a project at Purdue University in cs24000 - Programming in C

data.title: IRCServer
data.body: An irc server that works over local host created as a project at Purdue University in cs24000 - Programming in C

data.title: Jeffervescence
data.body: A website made during Xtern bootcamp session 2 that lists Jeff Goldblum movies, release year, and allows the user to favorite movies, reorder, delete, and clear the list

data.title: Password Generator
data.body: A password generator that takes user customizations and generates a fully-random or a pseudo-random password
